text.author: Jdlrobson, PsamatheM, Ikan Kekek and others (see URL)
text.title: York
text.summary: This guide to York, a Cathedral city in Yorkshire, England, with a population of 181,000, tells of its Roman and Viking era history, its renown for holding annual cultural festivals, and information about roads into the city, congested traffic and expensive parking.
